headline: Cigna Group (CI) Valuation Check After Recent Three Month Share Price Pullback
summary: Context for Cigna Group’s Recent Share Performance Cigna Group (CI) has seen relatively muted price moves in the past month, but a decline of about 12% over the past 3 months has drawn more investor attention to its fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Cigna Group. At a share price of US$271.24, Cigna Group’s recent 11.9% three-month share price decline contrasts with a five-year total shareholder return of 37.41%. This suggests that shorter-term momentum has faded, while longer-term...
